summary: Frontend testing completed for cleaning company booking app. All button click issues have been fixed. Tested: customer login/register buttons, guest button, profile login button, date selection modal, admin login, and logout functionality.

issues: Deprecation warning: 'shadow*' style props are deprecated. Use 'boxShadow'.
Deprecation warning: props.pointerEvents is deprecated. Use style.pointerEvents
Deprecation warning: style.tintColor is deprecated. Please use props.tintColor.

test_results.homepage_services: PASS - Services displayed with images and prices
test_results.register_form_toggle: PASS - Switches between login and register forms
test_results.guest_button: PASS - 'Misafir olarak devam et' navigates to home
test_results.profile_login_button: PASS - 'Giri≈ü Yap' button navigates to customer-login
test_results.customer_login_submit: PASS - Login with phone number works
test_results.date_selection_modal: PASS - Calendar modal opens with available dates
test_results.admin_login: PASS - Admin login with admin/admin123 works
test_results.logout_button: PASS - Logout redirects to customer-login page

critical_code_review_comments: Consider replacing deprecated style props (shadow*, pointerEvents, tintColor) with recommended alternatives to avoid future compatibility issues
seed_data_creation: None required - existing test data in database
context_for_next_testing_agent: All button click issues have been fixed by adding onClick handlers for web platform compatibility. React Native Web Pressable components require both onPress (for native) and onClick (for web) handlers. The app uses Expo Router for navigation.
